technologyImpact.title:
Deliver the Color Without Distortion
AI-Based High-Precision Color Measurement Solution
technologyImpact.description: We define color without sensation by combining algorithms and patented technologies.

item1.title: Calibration, the Standard of True Color
item1.description: We deliver quantified color values through our proprietary color correction technology.

item2.title: Precision Achieved by Algorithm
item2.description: TGRID's algorithm, trained with OpenCV and deep learning libraries, defines color without sensation.

item3.title: TGRID, Proven by Patents
item3.description: TGRID is a solution for medical color standards, validated by patents and papers.

patent1.title: Patent 1
patent1.subTitle: Dental Color Correction and Determination
patent1.description: Use sample teeth in clinical photos to correct and determine dental color

patent2.title: Patent 2
patent2.subTitle: Object Color Measurement
patent2.description: Method and device for measuring the color of an object

patent3.title: Patent 3
patent3.subTitle: Dental Color Correction Device
patent3.description: Method and device for providing dental color correction service and for the device

item4.title: Visualizing Color with New Inventory System
item4.description: TGRID introduces a new inventory system and visualizes color with color maps.

news.title: Newsroom
news.description: Check out the latest news and events from Additional Doctor.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Join us and create a brighter future together.

team.title: People Behind Another Doctor
team.description:
We are a team of doctors, engineers, and designers who are passionate
about building products that help people live healthier lives.

Joseph.name: Joseph
Joseph.description:
Hello and welcome to Another Doctor!
Over the past 20 years, I've focused on providing the best care to patients. Now, with AI and digital innovation, 
we're making healthcare smarter and more accessible for everyone. Stay tuned as we grow into a global healthcare platform!
career: Periodontology Specialist Program, Samsung Seoul Hospital
